![Lazy logo](logo.svg)

# Quick Share MD 
A toy project for sharing Markdown via URL.

# How to use
Just go to: [https://carlosmpv.github.io/quickshare-md](https://carlosmpv.github.io/quickshare) and start typing. Copy the URL to share with others.

# Disclaimer
- Content is limited to how big an URL can be.
- ⚠️ Generated markdown is sanitized with DOMPurify, but content may still be unsafe! ⚠️

# [Checkout this sample](https://carlosmpv.github.io/quickshare-md/?)
